participant_1.background:
I rode my bike 100 miles and ate a big bowl of chili afterwards.
I go on long walks with my dogs to keep fit.
i m taking online classes.
i graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.
I'm not sure if I have a favorite color to dye my hair, but I've been experimenting with different colors lately.

participant_2.background:
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.
I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

content.text: Hello! I hope your day has been going well!
Hello! It has been good! I just got home from work and I'm about to practice my music.
Ooh, what instrument do you play?
I play the viola. What about you, do you play any instruments?
I don't, unfortunately. I'm more of a writer.
That's awesome! I love to write too.
What do you like to write about?
I like to write poetry and short stories. I'm also working on a novel.
Wow, that's amazing! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I'm not sure I have the patience for it.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's so rewarding when you finish it.
I bet it is. I'm really impressed that you're working on one.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
I hope you'll let me know when it's finished. I'd love to read it.
Great! I'll be looking forward to it.
No problem. Have a good night!
